content.title: Entrepreneureship Development Programme (EDP)
content.details: The scheme 'Entrepreneureship Development Programme (EDP)' by the District Industries Centre, Department of Industries and Commerce, Union Territory of Puducherry aims to develop entrepreneurship skills by providing training for setting up of the projects. The programmes contains motivating the prospective entrepreneurs, highlight respective projects, the course of actions to taken by them for setting up and successful running their unit.
benefits: The entire expenditure towards the training will be met.
The period of training will generally be for a week.
eligibility: The applicant should be a native of the Union Territory of Puducherry (or) continuous resident of the area for the past three years.
exclusions: Already trained candidates are not eligible.
content.application_process: Offline. The interested applicant should take print of the prescribed format of the application form, fill in all the mandatory fields, paste the passport-sized photograph, and attach copies of all the mandatory documents. The applicant should visit the Deputy Functional Manager (EI) of the District Industries Centre (Thattanchavady, Puducherry - 605 009) to submit the application.
documents_required: Birth Certificate/ Residence-cum-Nativity Certificate, issued by the competent authority.

faqs.question: What is the primary objective of the 'Entrepreneurship Development Programme (EDP)' in Puducherry?
faqs.answer: Training aims to develop entrepreneurship skills for setting up projects.

faqs.question: How long is the typical duration of the training under the EDP scheme?
faqs.answer: The training period is generally one week.

faqs.question: Can individuals who have already undergone training apply for the EDP scheme?
faqs.answer: No, previously trained candidates are not eligible.

faqs.question: Where can interested applicants obtain the hard copy of the application form?
faqs.answer: Visit the Deputy Functional Manager at the District Industries Centre, Thattanchavady, Puducherry.

faqs.question: What steps are involved in filling out the application form?
faqs.answer: Fill in mandatory fields, affix a signed passport-sized photograph, and attach self-attested copies of mandatory documents.

faqs.question: Where is the District Industries Centre located for submitting applications?
During which hours can applicants visit the District Industries Centre for the application process?
faqs.answer: Working hours on any regular working day.

faqs.question: Is it mandatory for the applicant to be a native of Puducherry to apply?
faqs.answer: Yes, or they should be a continuous resident for the past three years.

faqs.question: What expenses are covered by the scheme during the training period?
faqs.answer: The entire expenditure towards the training is covered.

faqs.question: How is the applicant acknowledged for the receipt of their application?
faqs.answer: A unique number is assigned for all further references and serves as an acknowledgment for the receipt of the application.
